Portfolio

CSS Sprite Generator Tool

February 11, 2009

Using CSS Sprites technique for loading page images can provide serious performance improvements for you web site as it vastly reduces the amount of HTTP requests between the browser and the server.  The technique basically involves a single image file as a background image positioned in your element as a background image using negative margin coordinates. 

A great technique but the CSS can be a bit laborious to write but not with this ace tool CSS Sprite Generator!  Check it out.  I used the technique and tool to create the side navigation menu on the ViewTraffic.info site I have recently built.
